translations: 大挫折（blooper 的名词复数）

sentences.sentence: Halo: Reach - Fails of the Weak Volume 62 (Funny Halo Bloopers and Turkey Days!)
sentences.translation: 晕：达-失败的弱卷62(滑稽晕杂谈和土耳其天！)

sentences.sentence: Radio and TV sports running commentators occasionally come out with some bloopers .
sentences.translation: 无线电和电视的体育节目实况广播员偶尔会说错一些话。

sentences.sentence: Our reading for today isn't about language bloopers but the seeming foolishness of the message itself.
sentences.translation: 我们今天所读的经文内容，并非有关在语言上出现的洋相，而是有关那看似愚拙的说话内容。
